title: Create new draft and redeploy the same version (no code changes)

requirements.text: Create a new Caffeine draft and deploy the exact same application version currently deployed (Version 125) with no changes to backend or frontend source code and no state/schema migrations.

quotes: create a new draft and deploy the same version — no code edits needed.

acceptanceCriteria: A new draft is created and deployed successfully.
Deployment uses the same code as Version 125 (no source code edits).
No backend migration is executed/required as part of this redeploy.
The deployed app loads and is usable (basic smoke verification: app loads, Internet Identity login works, dashboard renders after profile is available).

requirements.text: Add new deployment documentation for this redeploy by creating Draft 125 versions of the existing templates: frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_125.md, frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_125.md, and frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_125.md, explicitly stating that there were no functional/UI/schema/state changes.

quotes: create a new draft and deploy the same version — no code edits needed.

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_125.md exists and follows the structure/pattern of prior REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_*.md files, referencing Draft Version 125 and 'Code Changes: None'.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_125.md exists and follows the pattern of prior REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_*.md files for Draft 125.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_125.md exists and follows the pattern of prior SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_*.md files for Draft 125.

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo, backend/migration.mo, or any application source code for this request.
Do not introduce new features or UI changes; this is a clean rebuild/redeploy only.
nonGoals: Fixing existing known issues (e.g., RBAC traps, env var misconfiguration risks, missing mood icon filenames).
Any refactors, dependency upgrades, or design changes.
